name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】桃鈴ねね x 星街すいせい x 常闇トワ　Christmas Live【 #ねねすいトワクリスマスライブ 】 [VVQQcI6r3NU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Opening performance of 'Guilty Party' by the three members.
MC section where the members introduce themselves and talk about the concert.
Solo performance of 'Lunch with me' by Tokoyami Towa.

subtitles.original: Party!
subtitles.english: Party!

subtitles.original: Party!
subtitles.english: Party!

subtitles.original: Party!
subtitles.english: Party!

subtitles.original: Come on!
subtitles.english: Come on!

subtitles.original: 忘れないで Dancing the beat
subtitles.english: Don't forget, dancing the beat

subtitles.original: 君のことが ずっと 好きさ Oh, oh!
subtitles.english: I've always loved you, oh, oh!

subtitles.original: 忘れないで Dancing the beat
subtitles.english: Don't forget, dancing the beat

subtitles.original: どこにいても 君が好きさ
subtitles.english: Wherever you are, I love you

subtitles.original: Come on!
subtitles.english: Come on!

subtitles.original: 夢だけ見て Dancing the beat
subtitles.english: Only dreaming, dancing the beat

subtitles.original: 君と笑って いたいだけさ Oh, oh!
subtitles.english: I just want to be laughing with you, oh, oh!

subtitles.original: 夢だけ見て Dancing the beat
subtitles.english: Only dreaming, dancing the beat

subtitles.original: 熱いままの 胸が痛いね
subtitles.english: My heart, still burning hot, aches

subtitles.original: It's party! Yeah! もう一度 Catch and jump
subtitles.english: It's party! Yeah! One more time, catch and jump

subtitles.original: Oh! Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh! Oh!

subtitles.original: Yeah! 前よりも 甘いね Baby
subtitles.english: Yeah! It's sweeter than before, baby

subtitles.original: It's party!
subtitles.english: It's party!

subtitles.original: Yeah! 見つめて もっと近く
subtitles.english: Yeah! Stare at me, even closer

subtitles.original: Guilty party 終わんないよ Hey!
subtitles.english: Guilty party won't end, hey!

subtitles.original: 改めまして、こんねねー！
subtitles.english: Once again, Kon-Nene!

subtitles.original: こんねねー！
subtitles.english: Kon-Nene!

subtitles.original: みんな、クリスマスライブに来てくれてありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much for coming to our Christmas live!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: そして今日は、ねねの3D企画ライブに...
subtitles.english: And today, for Nene's 3D project live...

subtitles.original: 一緒に1時間やってもらうことになりました！
subtitles.english: they've agreed to join me for an hour!

subtitles.original: 大丈夫か？
subtitles.english: Are you okay?

subtitles.original: すいちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Sui-chan!

subtitles.original: はーい！彗星の如く現れたスターの原石！
subtitles.english: Hi! A diamond in the rough that appeared like a comet!

subtitles.original: アイドルVTuberの星街すいせいです！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I'm the idol VTuber, Hoshimachi Suisei! Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: そしてトワ先輩！
subtitles.english: And Towa-senpai!

subtitles.original: こんやっぴー！
subtitles.english: Kon-yappi!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ4期生の常闇トワ様です！ドン！ドン！
subtitles.english: I'm Tokoyami Towa from Hololive 4th gen! Bam! Bam!

subtitles.original: そして、ホロライブ5期生オレンジ担当アイドルVTuberの...
subtitles.english: And, the orange-themed idol VTuber of Hololive 5th gen...

subtitles.original: 桃鈴ねねです！
subtitles.english: I'm Momosuzu Nene!

subtitles.original: ヘラヘラしすぎだろ！怖い！
subtitles.english: You're grinning too much! It's scary!

subtitles.original: ヘトヘトじゃねーか！
subtitles.english: You're exhausted, aren't you!

subtitles.original: 最後に重大発表もありますので、
subtitles.english: We have an important announcement at the end,

subtitles.original: よかったら最後まで楽しんでいってください！
subtitles.english: so please enjoy until the very end!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 最初は、どうだった？
subtitles.english: How was the start?

subtitles.original: いや、めっちゃ緊張した。
subtitles.english: Man, I was so nervous.

subtitles.original: なんか、めっちゃ緊張してたじゃん、ねねちが。
subtitles.english: Nene-chi, you seemed really nervous.

subtitles.original: 「ど、大丈夫かな？えっと...」って。ねねのごまかしだよね。
subtitles.english: Like, "Is... is it okay? Um..." You were trying to hide it.

subtitles.original: いやいや、でもね、めっちゃ良かったと思う。
subtitles.english: No no, but I think it was really good.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ練習してきたんで、今日。
subtitles.english: I practiced so much for today.

subtitles.original: そうだね、みんな、どうだった？
subtitles.english: Right. How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: どうだ、みんな！お前たち、どうだい、みんな！
subtitles.english: How was it, everyone! You guys, how was it, everyone!

subtitles.original: ほら、「かわいい、かわいい」ってみんな。
subtitles.english: Look, everyone's saying "Cute, cute."

subtitles.original: あ、本当？言ってる、言ってる。
subtitles.english: Oh, really? They are, they are.

subtitles.original: よかった！かわいいぞ、ねね！
subtitles.english: Great! You're cute, Nene!

subtitles.original: いやー、コメントが早すぎて読めない！
subtitles.english: Wow, the comments are moving too fast to read!

subtitles.original: 読めないね。ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: We can't read them. Thank you so much!

subtitles.original: さぁ、それじゃあ早速ですね、次のパートに移っていきたいと思うんですけど、
subtitles.english: Well then, let's move right on to the next part,

subtitles.original: ここからはなんと、ソロパートでございます！
subtitles.english: and from here, it's the solo part!

subtitles.original: やったー！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Hooray! Yay!

subtitles.original: え、まず、誰から歌うのかな？
subtitles.english: Um, first, who's going to sing?

subtitles.original: いや、トワからなのよ。
subtitles.english: No, it's from Towa.

subtitles.original: あ、そうなの？ちょっと乗ってよ、なんかコントとかさ。
subtitles.english: Oh, is that so? Come on, play along, like a skit or something.

subtitles.original: お前だよ、お前だよみたいの。やめてよ、ちょっと。
subtitles.english: Like, "It's you," "No, it's you." Stop that, come on.

subtitles.original: 行こう、うちら行こう。バイバイ！頑張ってね！
subtitles.english: Let's go, let's head out. Bye-bye! Good luck!

subtitles.original: 頑張れ！分かりました。
subtitles.english: Good luck! All right.

subtitles.original: ということで、トップバッターをいただきまして、ソロで、イェーイ！
subtitles.english: So, I'm the top batter, going solo, yay!

subtitles.original: 緊張するんですけど、まぁ、頑張って歌いたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'm nervous, but well, I'll do my best to sing.

subtitles.original: ちょっと、可愛い曲なんで、可愛く歌いますので、優しい目で見て、
subtitles.english: It's a cute song, so I'll sing it cutely. Please watch me kindly,

subtitles.original: 聴いてくれると嬉しいです！じゃあ、聴いてください！
subtitles.english: and I'd be happy if you listen! Now, please listen!

subtitles.original: Lunch with me!
subtitles.english: Lunch with me!

subtitles.original: Lunch with me
subtitles.english: Lunch with me

subtitles.original: 続く起きた朝は...
subtitles.english: On the morning after I woke up...

subtitles.original: なんだかいつもより眠くて
subtitles.english: I was somehow sleepier than usual

subtitles.original: 昨日の夜ずっと漫画を読んでたら
subtitles.english: Because I stayed up late reading manga yesterday

subtitles.original: 眠れなくってさ
subtitles.english: and I couldn't fall asleep

subtitles.original: 今頃そっちは、どこで何してるかななんて
subtitles.english: I wonder where you are and what you're doing now

subtitles.original: 考えてたら心が、ふわっと軽くなるんだ
subtitles.english: Thinking about it makes my heart feel light and airy

subtitles.original: これは内緒なんだけど、昨日の漫画の
subtitles.english: This is a secret, but in that manga yesterday,

subtitles.original: 主人公に君が ちょっと似てたんだよ
subtitles.english: the main character looked a bit like you

subtitles.original: ねぇ お昼 昼 昼 昼 昼 一緒に
subtitles.english: Hey, lunch, lunch, lunch, lunch, lunch, together

subtitles.original: 食べよう ちょっとだけ
subtitles.english: Let's eat, just for a bit
